channel.title: Court Wizard Rework [JOKE CLASS REWORK SUGGESTION]
channel.description:
Made this in 5 seconds on the discord, and one or two other people suggested new abilities/the passive.
this is not for the contest btw this is not a serious rework suggestion
CW Rework:
[color=gray]Court Wizard **Neutral Social**[/color]
[color=red]**Passive 1: Not Today! - If you try to convert the CW, you lose. (So if MM/CL try to convert the CW, their faction will automatically lose, because reasons)**[/color]
[color=red]**Passive 2: Targeted - You will know who the Prince is.**[/color]
[color=red]**Day ability 1: Whoops! - Make the prince jail himself.**[/color]
[color=red]**Day ability 2: Where are my keys? - Prevent the prince from jailing anyone.**[/color]
[color=red]**Night ability 1: Superultramegablockade - Occupy the prince! (Bypasses Prince's Super-Occ Immunity)**[/color]
[color=red]**Night ability 2: Wash - Remove any effects (heals, defends) from prince, and allow attacks only. The Prince will also be forced to execute the jailed target. (Yes, they can end up executing themself)**[/color]
[color=red]**Goal: Troll the Prince until he dies (Aka "Ensure that the Prince dies")**[/color]
give feedback or die >:D
(I think I made this too serious, but eh)

item.title: Court Wizard Rework [JOKE CLASS REWORK SUGGESTION]
item.dc:creator: Scath
item.description:
Made this in 5 seconds on the discord, and one or two other people suggested new abilities/the passive.

this is not for the contest btw this is not a serious rework suggestion

CW Rework:

Court Wizard Neutral Social

Passive 1: Not Today! - If you try to convert the CW, you lose. (So if MM/CL try to convert the CW, their faction will automatically lose, because reasons)

Passive 2: Targeted - You will know who the Prince is.

Day ability 1: Whoops! - Make the prince jail himself.

Day ability 2: Where are my keys? - Prevent the prince from jailing anyone.

Night ability 1: Superultramegablockade - Occupy the prince! (Bypasses Prince’s Super-Occ Immunity)

Night ability 2: Wash - Remove any effects (heals, defends) from prince, and allow attacks only. The Prince will also be forced to execute the jailed target. (Yes, they can end up executing themself)

Goal: Troll the Prince until he dies (Aka “Ensure that the Prince dies”)

give feedback or die >:D

(I think I made this too serious, but eh)

Read full topic
item.source: Court Wizard Rework [JOKE CLASS REWORK SUGGESTION]
